body.raw:
{
    "name": "Coffee Express oRewards",
    "brandId": "{{brandId}}",
    "description": "my new program",
    "termsAndConditions": "my Ts+Cs",
    "type": 2,
    "startDate": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "endDate": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "stampThreshold": 10,
    "enrollmentBonusPoints": 100,
    "status": "Active",
    "pointsConversionRate": 1.00,
    "dailyStampLimit": 10,
    "minimumTransactionAmount": 1,
    "pointsConfig": {
        "pointsPerPound": 10,
        "minimumPointsForRedemption": 500,
        "roundingRule": 0
    },
    "expirationPolicy": {
        "expirationType": 3,
        "durationInDays": 365,
        "expirationValue": 1,
        "expirationDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        "hasExpiration": true
    },
    "hasTiers": true,
    "tiers": [
        {
            "name": "Bronze",
            "pointThreshold": 0,
            "pointMultiplier": 1,
            "benefits": [
                "Earn 10 points per $1 spent",
                "Free birthday item"
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "Silver",
            "pointThreshold": 5000,
            "pointMultiplier": 1,
            "benefits": [
                "Earn 12 points per $1 spent",
                "Free birthday item",
                "Free size upgrade on any drink"
            ]
        },
        {
            "name": "Gold",
            "pointMultiplier": 1,
            "pointThreshold": 10000,
            "benefits": [
                "Earn 15 points per $1 spent",
                "Free birthday item",
                "Free size upgrade on any drink",
                "Free coffee on Mondays"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
